diff_act: 1.includes emoticons for enriching the content of the messages

regen.absent_element: mechanism to display or use offered emoticons for enriching messages
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a user interface to select and insert emoticons into the messages being composed.
The application shall save the chat history for future reference, allowing users to access previous conversations.

regen.absent_element: mechanism for adding or selecting emoticons to enrich messages
regen.new_specification: The application shall provide a mechanism for users to add or select emoticons to include in their messages.

label: Display a list of emoticons to choose from when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message.
absence: support of selecting emoticons when the user wants to include an emoticon in the message
